message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $9,500. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $9,500.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,250?
